description:
runtime: runtime.usleep() bugfix on darwin/amd64 and linux/arm

pkg/runtime/sys_darwin_amd64.s: fixes syscall select nr
pkg/runtime/sys_linux_arm.s: uses newselect instead of the now unimplemented (old) select
        also fixes the wrong div/mod statements in runtime.usleep.
Fixes issue 2633
